article.headline: Stocks open higher, on track for best week since August on fiscal stimulus hopes
article.body: U.S. stocks rose at the start of Friday's trade as fiscal stimulus negotiations appeared to move towards a more comprehensive package after the White House signaled it was open to a broader deal instead of standalone measures. The S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% rose 0.5% to 3,465. The Nasdaq Composite COMP, +1.39% added 0.5% to 11,481. The Dow Jones Industrial Average DJIA, +0.56% gained 139 points, or 0.5%, to 28,564. Shares of Advanced Micro Devices Inc. AMD, -3.94% faltered after The Wall Street Journal reported it was in talks to buy rival chip maker Xilinx Inc.
